name: .OZIP
summary: Learn about .OZIP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can use oppo_ozip_decrypt (cross-platform) or ozip2zip (Windows) to decrypt your OZIP file and transform it into a .ZIP archive. You can then view the file's contents as you would any Zip archive and use a ROM flashing program, such as Team Win TWRP (Android), to flash the firmware updates your file contains to your OPPO smartphone. TWRP also allows users to directly install OZIP files on their phones.
